title: Bad Bunny Stars in a Movie About Puerto Rico's Hero
summary: Bad Bunny, a famous singer, is going to be the main actor in a new movie called Porto Rico. This is his first time as the lead actor. The movie is about Puerto Rico, where Bad Bunny is from, and it tells the story of a hero named José Maldonado Román, who fought for Puerto Rico long ago. Other famous actors like Javier Bardem and Edward Norton will also be in the movie. The director is Residente, who is a rapper and also from Puerto Rico. He says the movie is like a love letter to Puerto Rico and will show its true history. Bad Bunny has been in other movies before, but only in smaller roles. He is very popular, and this movie is a big step for him. It will help people learn more about Puerto Rico's past.

Bad Bunny is a popular singer from Puerto Rico who is now trying acting. Movies can tell stories about history to help us learn and remember important events.
